title: Formation of atmospheric molecular clusters containing nitric acid with ammonia, methylamine, and dimethylamine
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00330F, Paper
Dong-ping Chen, Wen Ma, Ming Li, Yang Chun-Hong, Zhao-Zheng Zhou, Yang Zhang, Xi-Cun Wang, Zhengjun Quan
The study investigates the formation of atmospheric molecular clusters containing ammonia (NH3, A), methylamine (CH3NH2, MA), or dimethylamine (CH3NHCH3, DMA) with nitric acid (HNO3, NA) using quantum mechanics. Atmospheric Clusters...
